select r.role_name as roleName, r.status as status, r.create_by as createBy, r.create_time as createTime, r.update_by as updateBy, r.update_time as updateTime, r.remark as remark from sys_role r where r.del_flag = 0
and r.role_name like concat('%', #{roleName}, '%')
order by r.create_time asc
